<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Domain Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=4681) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you. Whenever you Refocus, completely refill your focus pool.
name: Domain Focus
